questions.question: Penelope's Test: In the final epic simile, what two things are being compared?

choices.answer: Wanting Odysseus home w/ Penelope and a swimmer in rough water
The way water flows out of pipes & blood flowing out of Antinous's nose
Odysseus did not do anything heroic, it was only about the dog.
The pile of the dead and dying suitors to a pile of fish

questions.question: Odysseus' Revenge: What is the simile used to describe Antinous's injury?

Odysseus did not do anything heroic, it was only about the dog.
The way water flows out of pipes to blood flowing out of Antinous's nose.

questions.question: Penelope: For what 3 reasons does Penelope feel that she must now marry one of the suitors?

choices.answer: Her parents are pushing her to marry again
She is running out of excuses
The suitors are giving her son a hard time and taking advantage of his land
All of the above

The pile of the dead and dying suitors to a pile of fish.
Odysseus compares the pile of the dead and dying suitors to a pile of fish

choices.answer: True
False

choices.answer: True
False

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: Odysseus and Penelope's bed is built from an olive tree still rooted in the ground.

choices.answer: True
False
passes away before Odysseus gets home.
jumps up to greet Odysseus.
helps kill the suitors.
remains alive until Odysseus returns home and then passes away.

questions.question: The challenge that Penelope sets out for the suitors involves

choices.answer: shooting an apple off the head of Telemachus.
stringing the harp of Odysseus.
stringing the bow and shooting it through the sockets of twelve ax heads.
shooting a single arrow at an ax.

questions.question: How has Penelope been stalling the suitors' marriage proposals?

choices.answer: Locking herself in her room
Weaving a funeral shroud for Laertes
Pretending to go insane
Disguising herself as one of the maids

questions.question: At the end of the story, the god/goddess that prevents fighting between Odysseus' people and the suitors people is

choices.answer: Athena
